basic.Peptide Name: Human beta-defensin 2 (hBD-2; Defensin, beta 2; Beta-defensin 4A; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D31(MIC=62 µg/ml), Escherichia coli ATCC (MIC=62 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC (MIC=62 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC (MIC=62 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC (MIC=15 µg/ml).
